explanation: [0-0] A young boy wearing a black and white top is standing on a floor covered with colorful foam mats. A young man in a gray top is sitting on a wooden stool by the sofa, with another stool placed in front of him. The man's left hand rests on the sofa, which has some coins on it, while his right hand is on the stool in front of him, also holding some coins. In the background, a dining table with chairs, a refrigerator, and a sliding room door are visible.
